00051                 public function testHasAnnotation() {
00052                         $this->assertTrue($this->annotations->hasAnnotation('Annotation1'));
00053                         $this->assertFalse($this->annotations->hasAnnotation('Bad'));
00054                         $this->assertTrue($this->annotations->hasAnnotation('Annotation3'));
00055                 }
00056 
00057                 public function testGetAnnotation() {

00060                 }

00063                         $annotations = $this->annotations->getAnnotations();
